long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a help to Christians who want to fill their day with holy thoughts, to be frequently reminded of some of their favorite scriptures and to draw closer to the Lord in prayer more often.  Rather than spending an entire day online working or surfing without thinking about or speaking to Our Lord, this extension will provide to with a scripture to reflect on, or a quick prayer to pray at an interval that you set.
